basic_data.name: LH
basic_data.description: A modern measuring machine that combines excellent mechanical engineering with intelligent software. It ensures reliability, ease of use, and flexibility, supported by a comprehensive service package.

main_characteristics.title: Excellence in Precision and Performance
content: LH measuring machines guarantee functionality, efficiency, and ease of use. Their success is based on a comprehensive concept that combines excellent mechanical engineering, intelligent software, and a variety of accessory and service options. These stable, reliable, and dynamic devices are universal measuring tools that perform excellently in various fields. They belong to the latest generation of gantry measuring machines with pneumatic bearings.

main_characteristics.title: Versatile Applications of LH Gantry Measuring Machines
content: LH gantry measuring machines are ideal tools for applications requiring high accuracy and fast measuring speed. They are widely used across various industries, from watchmaking to large engine manufacturing, where precision is crucial. Thanks to the configurable Y-axis, these machines can be adapted to measure long and specialized dimensions according to customer needs.
